General.Name: PT Sunter Lakeside Hotel Tbk
General.Description: PT Sunter Lakeside Hotel Tbk operates a 4-star luxury hotel under the Sunlake Hotel name in North Jakarta. The company operates through Hotel Services; Accommodation and Support Services; and Sports and Recreation Center Services segments. Its hotel provides guest rooms and suites, as well as various facilities and amenities, which include fast internet service, meeting room, party room, gym and fitness center, semi olympic size swimming pool, private tennis court, airport shuttle service, and others. The company was incorporated in 1991 and is based in Jakarta Utara, Indonesia.
General.Address: Jalan Danau Permai Raya Blok C1, Jakarta Utara, Indonesia, 14350
